message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many of our customers. It comes with exceptional features and quality. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Would you like to purchase it for $200?
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it.
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. Considering your budget, I am willing to negotiate further. How about $170 for the product?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $140 for the product.
Considering your offer, I'm glad we're finding common ground. I'm willing to sell the product for $155. This price includes some additional benefits and a slight discount for our ongoing discussion.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $155 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $145 for the product.
I understand your position, Bob. Let me propose a final offer of $152 for the product. This includes a small discount and a special gift with purchase. I hope this aligns better with your budget.
